doc:
Jan Miner https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jan_Miner 0 Jan Miner (October 15, 1917 – February 15, 2004) was an American actress best known for her role as the character "Madge" the manicurist in Palmolive dish-washing detergent television commercials beginning in the 1960s. Jan_Miner ( October_15_,_1917 – February_15_,_2004 ) was an_American_actress best_known for her_role as the_character_"_Madge " the_manicurist in Palmolive_dish-washing_detergent_television_commercials beginning in the_1960s .
